name: MimikyuWare
description:
First game im posting on here, for a gamejam too.

A WarioWare fan-game… another one i made… the other one is in development, just made this for fun

Only got to make 2 microgames for this though

Mimikyu is my characters partner… and i wanted to see how far i would get in less than an hour on a warioware game

scratch game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/753222606/
